entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Burwash Landing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
